actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for individual supplemental retirement savings.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $1,500 to $5,000 the deduction allowed for contributions to individual retirement accounts. Eliminates the present prohibition of such deductions by taxpayers who are participants in other retirement plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for individual supplemental retirement savings.
